description:
A mysterious young man, dressed in dark, glowy clothing, and always hiding his face. 
He likes shuffle dancing, and is surprisingly kind.

strings.default:
Today's just...
Not my day, I guess.

Ugh... I can't keep 
the beat at all...

Wooh...! I'm exhausted...
...and not in a bad way!!

Woah... I've never seen 
such a wild crowd...
